Of course, I'd be happy to recommend some musical movies based on your interest! 🎶 Here are two movies from the list that you might enjoy:

* La La Land (2016) - A romantic musical comedy-drama starring Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling as two aspiring artists who fall in love while chasing their dreams in Los Angeles. The film is full of catchy songs, stunning dance numbers, and a heartfelt story that will leave you smiling.
* The Greatest Showman (2017) - A musical biographical drama based on the life of P.T. Barnum, starring Hugh Jackman as the charismatic showman who brought entertainment to the masses. The film features original songs by Benj Pasek and Justin Paul, including "This Is Me" and "The Greatest Show," which will have you singing along long after the credits roll. 🎵
